name: Almost Autumn
description:
Help the magical pumpkin start Autumn by doing some quests.

a short low poly calm adventure within a magical forest.

a game made for the cozy autumn game jam 2022 hosted by Firith Studio on itch.io.

Music:

Forest Walk by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
